Public Methods

public static int getVersionCode (Context context)

Get the API version code.

Parameters
context the current application's context.
Returns
  • the version code of the API as an integer.

public static String getVersionName (Context context)

Get the API version name.

Parameters
context the current application's context.
Returns
  • the version of the API as a string.

public static void initialize (Context context, String developerKey)

Initialize the YouTube Android API. Must be called before any other calls to the library.

Parameters
context the current application's context.
developerKey a valid YouTube Developer Key generated using the YouTube Developer Dashboard.
